pages.text: $(li)The Straddleboard is a new way to traverse the Nether's lava lakes.$(br)$(li)It can perform high jumps above the lava and is much faster than $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/strider)Striders$(/l).

$(li)You can enchant it with $(l:patchouli:enchanting/alexsmobs/straddle_jump)Straddle Jump$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanting/alexsmobs/lavawaxed)Lavawaxed$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanting/alexsmobs/serpent_chamber)Serpent Chamber$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:enchanting/alexsmobs/returning_board)Returning Board$(/l).
